itemTooltip.ethereal_enchanting.xp_tome_: Stores up to 32 levels of XP
Place in an enchanting table to manage XP
itemTooltip.ethereal_enchanting.written_: You'll want to keep this for later
itemTooltip.ethereal_enchanting.rune_too: Place in a spell book to decipher automatically
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.celesti: Can not be destroyed and does not obey gravity
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.soulbou: Will never leave you  Do not let other souls get their hands on it though
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.unbreak: Prevents some durability from being used
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.slashin: Makes blades extra effective against armor
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.weighte: Perfectly balanced  or at least  it can be if you want
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.inducti: Holds an electric charge  Not the most conductive though
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.luck: May grant more items when hunting or mining  Beware of inventory cluttering
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.padded: Soft and delicate  Absorbs some sounds
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.plated: Extra defensive against sharp and pointy objects
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.elastic: Its like covering yourself in lots of little trampolines
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.thorns: Why should you be the one taking all the damage?
lore.ethereal_enchanting.enchant.soul_sp: Souls in the sand and soul will push you along
Item is immune to all damage, cannot despawn, disobeys gravity, and can only be picked up by whoever throws it.
Item teleports back to whoever throws it as soon as it hits the ground, unless it lands on soul sand/soil.
XP can be used to mend your equipment, including from xp tomes.
Item has a chance to not use durability.
For combat, slows your enemies. For boots, freezes water.
Sets fire to anything you hit.
Increases attack damage.
Can be focused towards higher attack speed or larger sweep attack range.
Attacking with this enchantment boosts the damage of the next inductive enchanted attack.
Deals more damage to an entity recently hit from a conductive enchant.
Reduces the effectiveness of the conductive-inductive combo against you.
Increases drops from mobs and some blocks.
For armor, equipping is silent. For tools, fragile blocks drop in block form.
Provides more protection against sword-like attacks.
Protects against thermal damage types such as powdered snow, fire, and kinda helps against lava.
Mace attacks bounce off you.
When taking damage, if possible, the attacker will take a percentage of the damage, and you will take less damage.
Blocks high damage attacks, but is ineffective against low damage attacks.
Attack, move, and mine faster in water.
Move faster while sneaking.
Move faster over soul sand and soul soil.
§kI dunno what to put here§r
Mobs may drop small amounts of loot before they die. Players may drop items from their inventory (except from hotbar)
advancements.ethereal_enchanting.root.de: The Minecraft enchanting rework by Westbot.

gui.ethereal_enchanting.enchanter.xp_tom: Insert XP Tome to manage levels
